statements: UPDATE order_fulfillment SET order_status='Shipped', quantity=10 WHERE order_id=123;

UPDATE Order SET total_amount = total_amount + 1000 WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity_available = quantity_available - 5, last_updated = '2022-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE product_id = 201;
